name: Acrobatics
example_uses: Stay on your feet in a tricky situation, or perform an acrobatic stunt

name: Animal Handling
example_uses: Calm or train an animal, or get an animal to behave in a certain way

name: Arcana
example_uses: Recall lore about spells, magic items, and the planes of existence

name: Athletics
example_uses: Jump farther than normal, stay afloat in rough water, or break something

name: Deception
example_uses: Tell a convincing lie, or wear a disguise convincingly

name: History
example_uses: Recall lore about historical events, people, nations, and cultures

name: Insight
example_uses: Discern a person's mood and intentions

name: Intimidation
example_uses: Awe or threaten someone into doing what you want

name: Investigation
example_uses: Find obscure information in books, or deduce how something works

name: Medicine
example_uses: Diagnose an illness, or determine what killed the recently slain

name: Nature
example_uses: Recall lore about terrain, plants, animals, and weather

name: Perception
example_uses: Using a combination of senses, notice something that is easy to miss

name: Performance
example_uses: Act, tell a story, perform music, or dance

name: Persuasion
example_uses: Honestly and graciously convince someone of something

name: Religion
example_uses: Recall lore about gods, religious rituals, and holy symbols

name: Sleight of Hand
example_uses: Pick a pocket, conceal a handheld object, or perform legerdemain

name: Stealth
example_uses: Escape notice by moving quietly and hiding behind things

name: Survival
example_uses: Follow tracks, forage, find a trail, or avoid natural hazards
